item.title: Docker Engine
item.description: 1. Install Docker First, we need to install Docker Engine according to the instructions on the official website. Then, for convenience, we can do the following to avoid typing ‘sudo’ each time. cat /etc/group | grep docker sudo groupadd docker # if no output sudo gpasswd -a ${USER} docker sudo service docker restart newgrp - docker 2. Image Command 2.1 search We can search Docker Hub to find docker images that we want.
